element.name: TabStopDialog
element.short: This is a local function that brings up a dialog box that allows the user to set their own tab stops.

element.name: TEditor.Center_Text
element.short: This procedure will center the current line of text.
element.descr: This procedure will center the current line of text. Centering is based on the current Right_Margin. If the Line_Length exceeds the Right_Margin, or the line is just a blank line, we exit and do nothing.

element.name: TEditor.Center_Text.Spaces
element.short: Array to hold spaces we'll insert.

element.name: TEditor.CharPos
element.short: Gets the exact Position in the Line Including Tabs

element.name: TEditor.CharPtr
element.short: Get Line-offset for a given Position (including Tabs)

element.name: TEditor.Update_Place_Markers
element.short: This procedure updates the position of the place markers as the user inserts and deletes text in the document.

element.name: TEditor.Tab_Key
element.short: This function determines if we are in overstrike or insert mode, and then moves the cursor if overstrike, or adds spaces if insert.

element.name: TEditor.Set_Tabs
element.short: This procedure will bring up a dialog box that allows the user to set tab stops.
